Modules

class UpsampleConv2d[source]

UpsampleConv2d(in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size=4, stride=2, padding=1, norm_type='batch', act='relu', bias=True) :: Sequential

基本上採樣： ConvTransponse2d -> Norm -> Activation

{% endraw %}

一般使用： Transposed Conv -> Norm -> Act

{% raw %} 
in_channels = 3
out_channels = 128
h = w = 32
batch_size = 8

x = torch.randn(batch_size, in_channels, h, w)
upconv = UpsampleConv2d(in_channels, out_channels)
out = upconv(x)

assert len(upconv) == 3
assert out.shape == (batch_size, out_channels, h * 2, w * 2)
upconv

UpsampleConv2d(
  (0): ConvTranspose2d(3, 128, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
  (1): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (2): ReLU()
)
{% endraw %}

單純上採樣，不使用 Norm 以及非線性 activation

{% raw %} 
linear_acts = ["none", "linear"]
for act in linear_acts:
    upconv_linear = UpsampleConv2d(in_channels, out_channels, norm_type="none", act=act)
    print(upconv_linear)
    assert len(upconv_linear) == 1

UpsampleConv2d(
  (0): ConvTranspose2d(3, 128, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
)
UpsampleConv2d(
  (0): ConvTranspose2d(3, 128, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class UnsqueezeLatent[source]

UnsqueezeLatent() :: Module

將 latent vector unsqueeze

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
batch_size = 32
latent_dim = 100

x = torch.randn(batch_size, latent_dim)
out = UnsqueezeLatent()(x)
assert out.shape == (batch_size, latent_dim, 1, 1)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class SqueezeLogit[source]

SqueezeLogit() :: Module

Squeeze Discriminator logit

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
batch_size = 16
dim = 50

x = torch.randn(batch_size, dim, 1, 1)
out = SqueezeLogit()(x)
assert out.shape == (batch_size, dim)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class DownsampleConv2d[source]

DownsampleConv2d(in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size=4, stride=2, padding=1, norm_type='batch', act='leaky_relu', bias=True) :: Sequential

基本下採樣： Conv2d -> Norm -> Activation

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
batch_size = 8
in_channels = 3
out_channels = 64
h = w = 32

x = torch.randn(batch_size, in_channels, h, w)
downconv = DownsampleConv2d(in_channels, out_channels)
out = downconv(x)
assert out.shape == (batch_size, out_channels, h / 2, w / 2)
{% endraw %}

Generator

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ConvGenerator[source]

ConvGenerator(latent_dim=128, out_dim=32, out_channels=1, kernel_size=4, max_channels=None, norm_type='batch', act='relu', dim_channel_multiplier=8) :: Sequential

將特定維度的潛在向量上採樣到指定圖片大小的生成器

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
batch_size = 8

for latent_dim, out_dim, out_ch in zip([128, 50, 100], [128, 64, 32], [3, 3, 1]):
    x = torch.randn(batch_size, latent_dim)
    g = ConvGenerator(latent_dim=latent_dim, out_dim=out_dim, out_channels=out_ch)
    out = g(x)
    assert out.shape == (batch_size, out_ch, out_dim, out_dim)
g

ConvGenerator(
  (0): UnsqueezeLatent()
  (1): UpsampleConv2d(
    (0): ConvTranspose2d(100, 256, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(1, 1))
    (1): BatchNorm2d(256, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (2): ReLU()
  )
  (2): UpsampleConv2d(
    (0): ConvTranspose2d(256, 128, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
    (1): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (2): ReLU()
  )
  (3): UpsampleConv2d(
    (0): ConvTranspose2d(128, 64, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
    (1): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (2): ReLU()
  )
  (4): UpsampleConv2d(
    (0): ConvTranspose2d(64, 1, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
    (1): Tanh()
  )
)
{% endraw %}

Discriminator

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ConvDiscriminator[source]

ConvDiscriminator(in_channels=1, in_dim=32, norm_type='batch', kernel_size=4, max_channels=None, dim_channel_multiplier=8) :: Sequential

將特定大小圖片下採樣的辨識器

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
batch_size = 8

for in_ch, in_dim in zip([3, 3, 1], [128, 64, 32]):
    x = torch.randn(batch_size, in_ch, in_dim, in_dim)
    d = ConvDiscriminator(in_ch, in_dim)
    out = d(x)
    assert out.shape == (batch_size, 1)
d

ConvDiscriminator(
  (0): DownsampleConv2d(
    (0): Conv2d(1, 64, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1))
    (1): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.2)
  )
  (1): DownsampleConv2d(
    (0): Conv2d(64, 128, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
    (1): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (2): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.2)
  )
  (2): DownsampleConv2d(
    (0): Conv2d(128, 256, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(2, 2), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
    (1): BatchNorm2d(256, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (2): LeakyReLU(negative_slope=0.2)
  )
  (3): Conv2d(256, 1, kernel_size=(4, 4), stride=(1, 1))
  (4): SqueezeLogit()
)
{% endraw %}
